tool.name: Pmxgentop
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the PMX gentop module.

param.name: input_top_zip_path
param.label: input ZIP file
param.help: Path the input GROMACS topology TOP and ITP files in zip format. Format: [input].zip

param.name: outname_output_top_zip_path
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: Path the output TOP topology in zip format Format: [output].zip

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: force_field
param.label: force_field
param.help: Force field to use. If **input_top_zip_path** is a top file, it's not necessary to specify the forcefield, as it will be determined automatically. If **input_top_zip_path** is an itp file, then it's needed.

param.name: split
param.label: split
param.help: Write separate topologies for the vdW and charge transformations.

param.name: scale_mass
param.label: scale_mass
param.help: Scale the masses of morphing atoms so that dummies have a mass of 1.

param.name: gmx_lib
param.label: gmx_lib
param.help: Path to the GMXLIB folder in your computer.

param.name: pmx_path
param.label: pmx_path
param.help: Path to the PMX command line interface.
